title: Thrift Buddy
description: ThriftBuddy is a tailored marketplace designed exclusively for students, providing a dynamic platform for buying, selling, and responsibly disposing of second-hand products within the university community. Our focus is on creating a seamless and engaging digital experience that aligns with the values of sustainability, community, and responsible consumption.

title: Fortune Wave Solutions
description: A web app mockup of a financial company with FWAlloc, FWLendIQ, and FWBanking features using Balsamiq

title: DCU Be on the Lookout (BOLO)
description: The novel web application is designed to enhance the efficiency of the Digital Federal Credit Union (DCU) in identifying and disseminating information about fraudulent individuals across all branches. This user-friendly app allows for the seamless recording of pertinent details, facilitating swift data sharing within the DCU network. By integrating Teams communication channels, the app enables real-time notifications to be promptly distributed to all relevant branches, fostering streamlined collaboration and expediting necessary actions. Robust security measures ensure the protection of sensitive data, with stringent authentication and encryption protocols maintaining confidentiality.

title: DCU AI
description: An innovative web app that used data models and ChatGPT to produce results to questions asked in the DCU domain. It contained various sections for DCU Admins to upload DCU based documents used by the data models to provide answers to employees within 30 seconds, lowering on call latency by 85%.

title: InventManager
description: A micro-service architecture based web application that enables users to upload, share and manage images using Terraform for Infrastructure as Code development.

title: InstaClone-Database Recreation & Visualization
description: Recreated Instagram's relational database management system complete in MySQL with ERD, data collection and cleaning, user registration, posts, reels, stories, likes, comments, tags, and other important functionalities. Database visualization in PowerBI was done for analyzing follower counts, engagement rates, and related metrics.
